DataElement.preferredName: Testicular Cancer American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC) Edition 7 Clinical Distant Metastasis M Stage
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Extent of the distant metastasis for the testicular carcinoma based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined prior to treatment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Malignant Testicular Germ Cell Tumor Clinical M Stage
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A malignant tumor predominantly affecting young men and often associated with cryptorchidism.  Seminoma is the most frequently seen malignant testicular germ cell tumor, followed by embryonal carcinoma and yolk sac tumor._Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity._One criteria of the TNM staging system.  M refers to the presence of metastasis.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A malignant tumor predominantly affecting young men and often associated with cryptorchidism.  Seminoma is the most frequently seen malignant testicular germ cell tumor, followed by embryonal carcinoma and yolk sac tumor. -- 2004

Concepts.definition: A malignant germ cell tumor that arises from the testis. It predominantly affects young men. Seminoma is the most frequently seen malignant testicular germ cell tumor, followed by embryonal carcinoma and yolk sac tumor.

Property.preferredDefinition: Having to do with the examination and treatment of patients.:One criteria of the TMN staging system.  M refers to the presence of metastasis.

Concepts.definition: Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity.
One criteria of the TNM staging system. M refers to the presence of metastasis.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

DataElementConcept.origin: AJCC Based:Staging Criteria Based on American Joint Committee on Cancer System
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for CRF standard harmonization. mc 1/31/17

ValueDomain.preferredName: Testicular Cancer American Joint Committee on Cancer Edition 7 Clinical M Stage
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A clinical finding about one or more characteristics of testicular cancer, following the rules of the TNM AJCC v7 classification system as they pertain to distant metastases._A group formed for the purpose of developing a system of clinical staging for cancer that is acceptable to the American medical profession and is compatible with other accepted classifications._The extent of a cancer in the body. Staging is usually based on the size of the tumor, whether lymph nodes contain cancer, and whether the cancer has spread from the original site to other parts of the body.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Testicular Cancer cM0 TNM Finding v7

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Testicular Cancer cM0 TNM Finding v7
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Testicular cancer without evidence of distant metastasis. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Testicular Cancer cM0 TNM Finding v7
Concepts.definition: Testicular cancer without evidence of distant metastasis. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Testicular Cancer cM1 TNM Finding v7

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Testicular Cancer cM1 TNM Finding v7
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Testicular cancer with distant metastasis. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Testicular Cancer cM1 TNM Finding v7
Concepts.definition: Testicular cancer with distant metastasis. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Testicular Cancer cM1a TNM Finding v7

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Testicular Cancer cM1a TNM Finding v7
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Testicular cancer with non-regional nodal or pulmonary metastasis. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Testicular Cancer cM1a TNM Finding v7
Concepts.definition: Testicular cancer with non-regional nodal or pulmonary metastasis. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Testicular Cancer cM1b TNM Finding v7

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Testicular Cancer cM1b TNM Finding v7
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Testicular cancer with distant metastasis other than to non-regional lymph nodes and lung.  (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Testicular Cancer cM1b TNM Finding v7
Concepts.definition: Testicular cancer with distant metastasis other than to non-regional lymph nodes and lung.  (from AJCC 7th Ed.)
